title: Femme Fatale
description: THE FEMALE OF THE SPECIES IS FAR MORE DEADLY THAN THE MALE. For too long women have been over looked in horror. This dark horror/erotic collection goes someway to rectifying that. Female writers will give horror a kiss of life. All writers have waved their royalties & all profits for the collection go to helping a charity to help victims of domestic abuse. So, support female writers and women in general. A Femme Fatale is the deadliest of the female species. Read these adult horror and erotica tales with loving care.
author: Leesa Wallace
